I frequent the suicide prevention center Pretty much the title.  Every so often I visit the suicide prevention center (with a mask of course) and talk to someone just outside the entrance of the suicide prevention center.  I typically go in the middle of the night after drinking (it's open 24 hours a day where I live).   I could call them of course...but I like the in person visits. I have so many of their cards with the phone number on them (one for each visit) like a deranged collection of pokemon cards (depressed pokemon used self destruct...it was super effective!).  Here's what I typically ramble to them (while drunk):  "Life is fundamentally absurd and futile."  "We are all born for no reason, work pointless jobs, and then fucking die!"  "Humanity is a collection of delusional and egotistical apes..I hate being a person!"  "I have nothing to look forward too and we are all pretty much fucked on a global scale"  "I'm a piece of shit who was born in a middle class family in a developed nation..and I have wasted so many opportunities. I deserve to live and die in misery."  "I want to hit positive people in the face with my frying pan!"   " I want to die in my sleep!!" Or "Fuck this shitty world!"  I say all these things with a few variations here and there.  I then typically burst into tears. The person listens and talks with me a little. I feel slightly better. Then I go home and sleep. The next morning I typically feel better..not amazing..but better.  There really is no point to this story...just stating one of my habits that relates to this sub. At least it keeps these thoughts at bay.

i have this feeling that i‚Äôm inevitably going to kill myself i‚Äôm zander. i‚Äôm fifteen, a sophomore in high school. i always have this feeling that i‚Äôm just ultimately going to kill myself. the thing is, i‚Äôm terrified of life. it fucking scares me. growing up is fucking scary. and i‚Äôm growing up too fast, i feel. i‚Äôve been grappling with depression since the middle of eighth grade, kickstarted by an abusive relationship, and it has only gotten worse throughout the years. my grades in school have me barely getting by ever since, and they‚Äôve only gotten worse with this covid shit. this causes me to feel like a failure. i feel like a loser in comparison to everybody i know. i am stubborn as all hell and unmotivated as shit to do anything in school right now. so when they ask me to treat online school like normal school... when i haven‚Äôt seen my fucking friends, my primary motivator in school, for ten months... when my fucking teachers are getting swapped out left and right... when they load me with more work than i‚Äôve ever seen in my life, yeah, i‚Äôm gonna get pissed. i‚Äôm gonna say fuck you. when something doesn‚Äôt feel right, it may as well suck my dick. i hate it but that‚Äôs who i am.  i don‚Äôt know what career i want to pursue. i never have. no goals. i DO want to love. believe it or not, i have an extremely big heart. i was put on this earth to love somebody else, i believe. but without a job, nothing is possible. without job, no money. without money, no nothing. i hate that. if it were my world, i would be spending everyday with the person i love doing whatever i desire. that‚Äôs not the case, obviously. whatever the fuck we want. sounds like heaven, right?  i don‚Äôt think i was cut out to live this life. i‚Äôm too stubborn. a rebellious nature that i can‚Äôt control always has its grips on me. the only reason i haven‚Äôt killed myself yet is because i don‚Äôt want to harm my family. all of which i love, but certainly don‚Äôt like. they‚Äôre all kind of toxic people and annoy the fuck out of me. i probably am too. but the idea of inflicting so much pain upon my mom makes me sick. it‚Äôs not fair, and as ive said before, i don‚Äôt like to do not fair. i never asked to live, and really want to die. why should i feel bad about suicide? i don‚Äôt know. i almost resent my mom for bringing me onto this earth. i won‚Äôt watch myself become a sad and pathetic adult like my dad or aunt. i just know it‚Äôs gonna happen. life is fucking brutal, i know. i‚Äôve seen it. it‚Äôs scary. but i‚Äôm already becoming my worst fear: a sad and pathetic adult. i feel like i‚Äôd be happier dead. if reincarnation is a thing, hopefully i get lucky, or else i‚Äôll probably just kill myself again. if things just go black, shit, even better. i don‚Äôt ever have to exist again. i don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs next. but anything seems better than living on this earth. i wish things were different. i do. but i won‚Äôt let life destroy me the way it has everybody else. everybody is so sad. i‚Äôll fucking kill myself before i disappoint my fucking family who has done a GOOD job raising me and taking care of me. wish i could just let life fuck me in the ass like it does to everyone else but i cant. i want to die so bad. god i seriously want to die so fucking bad

First time I ever consider suicide Sorry for the long post.       I never considered suicide until last year, but I don't think I can go on much longer.        I'm from Lebanon, a small country in the Middle East. You may have heard about it in the news. This country that had an extraordinarily rich culture, perfect geography, and infinite potential, has turned to a literal hell hole in the span of a year and a half. And the worst is yet to come.           In 2019 I was 22, freshly graduated, and had my first job. I had moved out and started living independently, life was fucking great but I didn't realize it back then. I'll spare you the political and economical details unless someone is interested, but in October everything started turning to shit. The effects of decades of widespread corruption and sectarian division started to show, and the economy started going downhill.        I lost my job in January of 2020, along with a huge chunk of the population. I had to start financially relying on my parents again, which already took away what I enjoyed the most in my life: the fact I was finally a self-sufficient, responsible person. Then covid hit. And then on August 4th 2020, what some of you may know Lebanon for, happened.       The third biggest non-nuclear explosion in the history of mankind happened in the heart of Beirut, the capital. It created a shockwave that was felt all the way to Cyprus, a fucking ISLAND 200 kilometers away from Lebanon. Why? Because the government was so corrupt and negligent that thousands of tons of explosive chemicals were dangerously stored in a warehouse and caught fire.      Thankfully my family and I lived far enough from the explosion to suffer nothing but shattered windows, but I was a few hundred meters away from the blast when it happened. You can find footage of the explosion online, so I don't think I have to go in detail as to what happened. I knew my family were home so I didn't worry about them, but my grandpa lived even closer to the blast than I was, and phones were unusable. I started running towards his home, as I anticipated seeing him crushed by rubble.      The thought of describing what I saw that day, running through the city where I made my strongest friendships, found love, studied, graduated, and got into the professional world, already has me shaking and crying.     Entire houses and buildings I knew had turned into rubble. The road was a sea of glass, stone, and cement. Sirens, people shouting, screaming, crying, everywhere. I don't even want to think about how many dead people I ran by. I don't think anyone can even make a movie like this. I think I'm gonna stop talking about this.     Thankfully my grandpa only suffered minor injuries. I'm glad I wasn't the one to take him to the hospital because I don't think I could have taken it. I've heard stories and seen videos of destroyed hospitals, that were already crowded with covid cases, walls and floors covered in blood and doctors performing surgeries on the floor.       This was the last straw for Lebanon. In 2019, 1$ was equivalent to 1500 Lebanese pounds. Today, it's 13800, and increasing by the day. Medicine, fuel, electricity, and food are becoming less and less accessible. People are fighting in supermarkets over bread or milk for their kids. Lebanon is the poorest, hungriest, and most politically unstable it has ever been. Robberies and violence are becoming routine. We're headed to a collapse that will be remembered in history books as a case study of how corrupt, evil, greedy, and hateful humans can get.     And then there's me. I've spent the last few months alone in my appartment because of lockdowns and the financial crisis, with no job, no foreign passport or any other way to get out of this hell hole, and nothing to do except watching netflix or playing video games when the electricity and internet connection allow it. I roll a joint the second I wake up because I don't think I can face this life sober for a single hour.       Millions of people around the world go through poverty, traumas and wars, but what kills me from the inside is remembering the life I had, and could have had. I was a regular kid from a regular family, had friends, went to school, and was about to live a normal life. Now I understand how valuable this is. Many of my friends managed to leave or had already left to study abroad before the crisis. The others I barely see anymore. I can't imagine what my parents are going through, raising me for all these years just for me to have my life taken away from me like that.  I have no one to open up to, which is why I'm writing on a new account.       Now I can't do anything other than being a spectator of my own existence and watch hell break loose from my window, holding on to the memory of the two decades of "normal life" I had. I guess I'll just continue to exist until I find the courage to get this over with, or until some other mega bomb goes off next to my home.       I beg you to enjoy every friend, family member, pet, every meal in a restaurant, every roadtrip, every party,  every exam, hour spent at work, every laughter, every argument, every fight, every kiss, and every drink as if they were the last you will ever have, because they might very well be.

I‚Äôve usually been a spectator I‚Äôve been spectating this sub for a while now (I have an older profile that I kind of abandoned, hence why this one is so new), but I need to get a couple things off of my chest.   I‚Äôve ‚Äúattempted‚Äù suicide 4+ times (varying degrees, ig. 4 times it was seriously fucking serious)   One of those times was when I was 12 years old.   As I wasn‚Äôt a teen yet, they had to find my a psychiatric hospital with a children‚Äôs unit. They put my in a hospital hours a way from my home. It was abusive. Locking us away in empty, cinderblock rooms for no reason. Making us strip and having only one adult watch us as we do so. No soap (I got so sick with diarrhea that I passed out). Most staff came in high or hungover to the point of barely functioning. Stuffed in a little unventilated room with kids continually messing themselves. Watching endless movies. They sedated me beyond necessary, giving me some kind of ADHD med from the 80s or some shit, so they could focus on the homicidal patients. Oh yeah, forgot to add that I saw people try to kill each other, saw people stab themselves, etc.) One person on the teen‚Äôs unit was getting violent threats against her by other teen patients *because she patient threatened to do sexual things to them*. Naturally, the crackhead staff decided, in order to protect her, they should put her on the children‚Äôs unit. One thing led to another and now I have diagnosed PTSD.   My eldest brother has a lengthy history of verbal, physical, and mental abuse against me and my siblings. My parents pretty much watched him destroy us, as they felt it was normal under his supposed ‚ÄúAsperger‚Äôs‚Äù diagnosis. Talking to my multiple psychiatrists I‚Äôve had over the years, nearly every single one has said that he legitimately sounds sociopathic.   Anyway, among my various hospitalizations (there are a lot) many professionals have gaslit new into thinking certain things. As, apparently, sexual assault by a woman is impossible, they convinced me that a man had done something to me. It‚Äôs all a bit foggy, as, when these things were hammered into my brain, I was having a psychotic episode.   I‚Äôve always been terrified of the fact that my eldest brother did something to me unspeakable. After years of having night terrors of being raped and touched by priests + famous people, I finally dreamt about someone I know. My brother. My life is a living hell. I need to move out. I need to move out. I‚Äôm working really hard to graduate a year early. I hate this. I know my parents would have let that happen to me. They left me alone with him so many times, always drilling me ‚ÄúIf he hurts you, call 911.‚Äù I‚Äôm scared of living here.   On top of all that, I accidentally came out to my parents as bi (It‚Äôs too raw to go into details), and they weren‚Äôt accepting. It‚Äôs hard to discredit them, as they talk so reasonably. If they were screeching and yelling at me, trying to disown me, it would be easy to write them off as batshit crazy. Instead they chalked it up to a defect due to trauma, and that they still love me ‚Äúdespite all my flaws‚Äù. It hurts to know that it‚Äôs all just a deformity to them. I want to be good. I‚Äôve acknowledged that I‚Äôll never have their approval in marrying someone my same sex, which will probably lead me to never marrying at all (as that‚Äôs who I‚Äôm primarily attracted to).   In attempts to hide these feelings and push them away, I lost the only friend I ever had (this was well over a year ago). She had a crush on me, and I cut her off. Partially due to trauma, yes, but also because I was terrified to like her back. I missed out so much. She was kind and cute. She, too, had sexual trauma. We would have been the gentlest with each other. I could‚Äôve had a girlfriend who loved and cherished me. Instead I got emptiness and loneliness. The last text that I received (excluding of my family) was from a girl who just wanted help with homework... in April.  I‚Äôm lonely and don‚Äôt know if I‚Äôll ever find love, due to both religious and sexual trauma.   I don‚Äôt want to kill myself (so maybe posting here is a waste of time). I‚Äôm so excited for my future. I want to be an aerospace engineer. I want to make friends. I want to meet a lovely person one day to marry (which is kind of a slim chance at this point). I want to adopt kids. There‚Äôs so much ahead of me. But right now I really just want to die. Not kill myself. Just die. I‚Äôm coming up on a ton of violently bitter anniversaries. Fall is a motherfucking bitch.

Im just stuck Okay, Im really not the type to post this sort of stuff but I guess I just have to get it off my chest. I'm a 23M, and father of 2 girls. I'm from Aus, so there is alot of mental health support and I've seen multiple people. I'm about to see another phsyciatrist in a couple days to more properly diagnose what I'm going through and hopefully get me on the right medication. Now, what I'm trying to get to is, I'm not bothered anymore. I'm not bothered seeing anyone anymore, I'm not bothered trying to distract myself anymore, I'm not bothered trying to get better anymore. I have been going through depression for the last 5 years or so (I know it isn't long, but for me it's felt like my whole life). I feel like I'm ready to go, I feel like I'm not scared of death, if anything I feel like I embrace it. I want to end this pain that I go through every single day, but I can't. I can't bear to think that my two daughters will grow up without a dad, I can't bear to think that my partner won't have anyone to help with the kids, I can't bear to think that my widowed mum will be by herself. But it pisses me off soo much that I can't leave this terrible place because of them. I'm stuck here. I'm stuck living a life that I don't want to live. I just want to know what to do!! Everyone says just keep trying, it will get better, but it doesn't. And if it will, I can't wait anymore. I cant deal with this anymore. But I have to do. Even though everyday that I wake up I just feel closer and closer to suicide. I don't find joy in anything, everything I loved I no longer enjoy, going to beach houses, holidays, movies anything that a normal person would enjoy, I don't. I literally don't find joy in anything anymore. Well that's my rant done. Sorry for bothering anyone.

Gotta relive my past Hi all, so I recently had yet another mental health assessment after having 3 incorrect diagnosis since 2018 so in 2018 I was diagnosed with bipolar which I later with the help of a psychiatrist found out was wrong, in 2019 I was diagnosed with schizophrenia when in hospital which we figured out is wrong and in 2019 while in prison I was diagnosed with a paranoid disorder which is partly right as it‚Äôs intermittent. I have now been given a new diagnosis and I feel that this one is correct I have looked through all the symptoms and also got a third party, who I live with to look up the symptoms and they said it describes me perfectly and I agree, my new diagnosis are EUPD (Emotionally Unstable Personality Disorder) which is a form of BPD (Borderline Personality Disorder) finally now I might get some answers and my game plan for my therapy sessions going forward in this order is: 1. Learn coping techniques for when i feel like self harming or wanting to die 2. Learn how to show emotion as I find it had to show anything apart from happy or angry 3. Talk through my past experiences with the therapist as that has defiantly had a negotiable effect on me and I feel a lot of guilt about the things I‚Äôve done 4. Build a future and prove to myself that I can do it and I can make what I want happen in my life. Become a legend in my chosen field of work (film)   I‚Äôm feeling very positive for the future if anyone needs any help or to talk just inbox me

I'm a horrible person I doubt anyone will actually read all of this, let alone respond.... But I have nobody to talk to right now, so I'm just going to do it here...   So I had the girl of my dreams, everything I could've ever asked for... And I emotionally/mentally abused her. She has a history of very abusive boyfriends (everything from rape, to being beaten, to mental bullying) and uses drugs to escape her misery and pain... and I promised her I would never hurt her. I promised her I would be so much better than her exes. And I fucking failed her.  (a little context before I continue, we were long distance but not extremely so. She's in Ohio, I'm in Illinois.)  What did I do, you ask? Rape her? Beat her? No, I would never lay a hand on a woman like that. I was raised to respect women and even took a little while to get comfortable being sexual with her out of fear of being disrespectful...   But that's besides the point. What I did was harass her. Whenever we'd have a fight (as all couples inevitably do), she'd try to walk away from it to cool down. She hates confrontation and wants to avoid stress and drama. What did my piece of shit worthless self do? I fucking spammed her with calls on messenger, skype, over phone, you name it. For whatever reason my stubborn ass just couldn't leave things be for at times. And when she'd block my accounts, I just made more and kept harassing her to talk to me. I once even threatened suicide if she didn't talk to me.  My biggest problems in the relationship were 1) I'm co-dependant. 2) I got overly upset over little stuff (not violently so, I'm not a violent person). And 3) Harassing her when she didn't want to talk. Our first break up was October 30th, last year. Yep, Halloween. I sure didn't get a treat this year, that's for sure!   Hahaha ^^^kill ^^^me  She relapsed and started doing drugs again immediately after the breakup, and had been clean since before we had gotten together, and I still blame myself for that. I begged and pleaded with her for another chance. I promised I could be better. She waited a few weeks to see if I would actually make an effort to be better, and I did make some progress, but then started getting worse again eventually. She then broke up with me for the second time back in February, and I tried to kill myself for the first time in my life (and didn't even come close because I'm an idiot). After a few weeks, we had started talking again in early March. We both still loved each other, still were sweet with each other, basically we treated each other as if we were together but we never officially got back together. A few weeks ago... I got overly upset over some really little things, and I think that was the straw that broke the camels back.   One night a couple weeks ago, she told me she no longer loved me. She said she'd rather die than ever be with me again, and called me a psycho. There are very few times in my life that I will ever be that devastated... Over the past couple weeks, I kept harassing her, begging for another chance,... But I've just been making it worse. The past few days, it got to a point where my ex's "best friend" started sending me really toxic. And hateful messages, basically mocking my mental illness and suicidal tendencies. Some of the shit she said to me could drive a more unstable person to suicide... She also tried scaring me with threats about lawyers and similar bs (that was days ago, and she claimed I'd be hearing from them in a couple of days).  Yesterday around noon, she spent around 2 hours just fucking mocking me. I wasn't even being rude to her, I was legitimately trying to be nice, but she already made her judgement on me based on whatever my ex told her. The friend even said that my ex would be better off with her previous ex (who beat her, raped her bullied her into sex, cheated on her, etc.). Basically just kicking me while I'm down, not that I didn't deserve it.   Just a few hours ago...me and my ex talked over voice for the first time in weeks, and of course everything that's happened in the past week cane up... I have never felt like such a piece of shit in my life. It was killing me inside, hearing the pain and misery in her voice. I legitimately wanted to die, as she told me about the breakdowns she was having the other day because of me. Apparently her friend was scared she was going to kill herself... I have been laying here, crying the last few hours. I can't believe I did that to her, I can't believe I put her through that, I can't believe I hurt her so much after I promised I wouldn't. I actually feel like the worst person in the world right now because I hurt the person I love more than life itself so much.... I really just want to die right now and do the world the favor of finding myself. (un)fortunately, I don't have access to a quick and painless way to do it, so I just cut myself for the first time since the February breakup. And I'm sitting here dishing I had been better, wishing I could have just one more chance to be with her, to redeem myself... But won't get one. I blew it. I had the girl of my dreams at a dark time of my life, and I blew it. I'd give anything to have her love again. I was lucky I even earned it in the first place.  The other day, my ex said it would be great if we could just be best friends. When I asked her if maybe we could try again one day of I bettered myself, she said possibly but that she couldn't make any promises. Earlier tonight, she had me make two promises, 1) Not to harass her anymore. And 2) To not ask her for another chance ever again... I think making that second promise actually killed me a little inside. But I don't want her out of my life, I loved and care about her with all my heart, so I made it.  So as of right now, we're "best friends", though I wish and yearn to be more again, my heart aches for it. Though in her voice earlier it sounded almost like hatred, though that could've been just her getting emotional while going over the breakdowns I've caused her. Eventually she said she had to go because her phones better was dying, and I asked her what about her laptop and she seemed to have come up with an excuse on the spot. So I said bye, crying, while apologizing for everything and telling her I love her. She seemed still upset with me and hasn't answered my texts since. She's a night person, so she's normally up around this time. I could just be overthinking things, Idk. I do have the tendency to do that.  I just feel like the worst person on earth, I feel so heartbroken, so guilty, so regretful. I wish I could turn back time and fix my mistakes, but all I can do is try to learn from them.... But that don't get me the girl of my dreams back :(  So this is where I'm at now. In the middle of the night, emotional, cut myself, wanting to die, being socially inept, having little to no friends, wishing I had been better, feeling like a grade A piece of shit, and I've essentially been friendzoned by the woman I love. Life is fucking fantastic!   For what it's worth, I never did anything wanted to hurt her, and I did do a lot of good for her. She left her extremely abusive boyfriend she was with for years, to be with me, some loser she met on the internet. She had little to no self esteem, because of other people, and I helped boost it immensly by assuring her of how powerful and amazing she is. I always loved her unconditionally and always did my best to make her feel loved and appreciated. And I once stopped her from killing herself. She was actually planning on ODing on heroin one night, and I was able to talk her out of it and convince her this world would not be better off without her. I've never been more scared in my life than I was that night, begging and pleading with the woman I loved not to kill herself... So yeah, I wasn't all bad, but I sure feel as bad as can be :(  If I could have any one wish, I wouldn't hesitate. I'd give anything to earn her love again. To hear her say "I love you", to hear her call me babe again. The chances of that ever happening though are literally slim to none. Regardless though, I'll always love and care about her and be there for her when she needs me as I've always been. I have never, and could never hate her. She was the best thing that ever happened to me... And I can't ever forgive myself for abusing her.   Sorry if my thoughts are all over the place, I'm not exactly at 100% right now. Honestly I wish I could get high right about now...

I‚Äôm happy but I‚Äôm not? Hi there, I just thought I would talk about something and see if anyone else relates or can just talk to me about this? I always feel like a burden or an attention seeker when I go to my family or friends about this stuff.   I was diagnosed with chronic depression when I was twelve-years-old. I‚Äôm twenty-one now. Everything is going really well for me, I‚Äôm considerably content with my life. I‚Äôm about to start my last semester of university. I‚Äôm not making any money but I also live comfortably in my home. Not in a relationship but I‚Äôve never needed one. Anyways, today was a considerably very good day. I was happy at the start, I video chatted my friends (like eight people) for a few hours. We had fun and did our make up together. It was very easygoing.   As soon as I hung up the phone, I wanted to lay down and watch a movie. I went to turn it on but‚ÄîI couldn‚Äôt. Like I couldn‚Äôt think of anything to watch or even think of anything to focus on. I sat there for a moment and then my brain went, ‚ÄúI wish I was dead.‚Äù Just so abruptly and of course, I went, ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt be stupid, chill.‚Äù I would never ACTUALLY hurt myself. Can a young person be really suicidal? This post was inspired by this exchange.  Most calls for help here can be divided in two groups: the younger than 30 years old and the older. Both groups are capable of gulping too many pills, but I‚Äôm wondering to what degree we‚Äôre observing very different situations.   An 11 years old who wants to ‚Äúkill herself‚Äù is in pain. The pain is overwhelming and her experience doesn‚Äôt give her ways to find relief. There may not be relief. In any case, her focus on the pain of the moment makes the potential of a good future completely disappear from her option. So, ok, let‚Äôs tell her that we love her and try change her mind.  But a 50 years old is an adult. She went through multiple experiences, the death of her parents, the birth of her son, a good job, a good friendship, an abusive boss, a betrayal. The 50 years old knows what she‚Äôs feeling, she‚Äôs less likely influenced by a road rage episode from that morning. If she wants to die, she must know what she‚Äôs saying.  If we really want to help, our attitude to responding to these two profiles must be very different. We could use white lies with the former, but we don‚Äôt want to say bullsh*t to the latter and further destroy her already crumbling faith in humanity.  However, most of times, support comes only in the first form, like we were all 11 years old. Are we sure we‚Äôre not making more damage than benefit? Personally, with the second category, I believe that empathising is more useful than trying to change their mind. Sharing that I‚Äôm suicidal, too, will make her feel less alone and think twice to her choice.  Any experts among the readers?  Thanks.

I am supposed to be dead right now But I'm not.  May 11th. May 11th was the day. For the past few months, I've been looking forward to it. May 11th. The day I would finally leave. The day my struggles ended. The day I could finally have peace... I was 100% set on this decision. I was going to die  But my problems and struggles ended sooner. A week before my death, I received help. My loved ones showed me that I was loved, that I was worth it. An AskReddit thread showed me what people would be like once I was gone. I'd 100% recommend reading it if you are feeling suicidal  I scrapped all my goodbye notes, I got rid of everything and worked on myself. The day came last night, and I'll admit I was tempted. It would be easy to leave and kill myself like I had planned. But I forced myself to sleep, allowing myself to carry on for many more days.  **But every bad chapter of our lives is nothing but a parabola. It goes down and down and down, it gets worse and worse, and it might get worse tomorrow. But it'll hit the vertex eventually, and from then on it's always going up. Better and better, you'll feel free.** Keep fighting until that vertex. Once you get past that moment, you're free.  **Because every treacherous ocean will always have to hit the land eventually. So keep swimming through. Don't let yourself drown, because just a little longer and all your dreams can come true. You will live your dream life.**  Last night wasn't easy for me. I even learned that my ex left me because of another guy. So the emotions were extremely overwhelming, but I fought through it. Look at my old posts, and you'll see how beyond hope I was. I was so set on killing myself, and now, every day, I'm loving myself a little bit more.  There is a reason to keep living. There is a reason to keep going. You are beautiful. You are worth it. Keep on living and never give up on your life. I love you <3

I honestly can‚Äôt imagine liking my appearance (long vent) I never liked myself or thought I was pretty even when I was little. Back then I was mostly just indifferent to the way I looked, like I didn‚Äôt hate my appearance but I definitely didn‚Äôt love it. I do remember hating all my school pictures, and whenever I had to see my most recent one I‚Äôd look away because I disliked looking at myself. This was back when I was in about third grade I think.  Looking back, I don‚Äôt think I was pretty as a kid despite when people say. My family thinks I was a gorgeous baby and kid, but I really don‚Äôt see it. When I was in fifth grade there was a slideshow of all the kids in the grades‚Äô baby, kindgarten and current pictures at elementary school graduation, and I remember wincing when mine can up. I was ashamed that everyone had to see me as an ugly little kid.  As I‚Äôm writing this I realize how awful it sounds. Maybe there‚Äôs just no such thing as a good picture of me, but either way I‚Äôm not made for photos. Even when I was little I wasn‚Äôt.  I really don‚Äôt know how other people can look at themselves in the mirror and not hate what they see. I‚Äôm happy they all don‚Äôt have to go through what I do. Saying this makes me feel incredibly awful, because I‚Äôm not covered in scars (on my face or other easily visible body parts at least) and don‚Äôt have any disfigurements or anything. I just hate my skin, my face, my everything.  Everyday when I wake up and look in the mirror I can‚Äôt help but think about how unattractive I am. I constantly think about how no one would ever want me and how I‚Äôll never date anyone for several reasons, one of them being how much I dislike myself and my appearance. I think I‚Äôd be unfair to a potential boyfriend to have to date someone who hates themselves as much as I do, and that‚Äôs assuming someone would actually like me.  Two boys have liked me in the past, one in ninth grade and one a few weeks ago at a psych hospital. The one from ninth grade told me he liked me but not just because I was pretty, but for other reasons I forgot about. He was overall scary and extremely manipulative, so I took that with a grain of salt. The psych hospital guy was really nice and when I mentioned how unattractive I thought I was, he said that all the boys in the room would disagree. He ended up being manipulative as well and was scary too, and I‚Äôm never seeing him again anyways so I disregarded that statement.  I just don‚Äôt believe it when people call me pretty. I know that when you like a person they look more attractive to you and when you dislike someone they look uglier to you, so when my friends say how pretty I am I just remember that and think that must be the reason. Or they‚Äôre just being nice.  I know I‚Äôll never date anyone for a lot of reasons, like because I‚Äôm scared of boys/men, hate myself and how I look, have trauma, and am asexual and afraid of sex in general. I don‚Äôt think anyone would want me.  Sorry for being a bummer yet again, I just don‚Äôt know where else I could vent about this. I feel so incredibly bad about myself every day and wanted to get this out.

Kinda amazed I'm still around honestly. I'm 27, going to turn 28 in a few months. I've been depressed for as long as I can remember. When I was in elementary school I used to constantly wish I had never been born. I was convinced I'd kill myself by the time I was 16. Obviously, that didn't happen.  I've had ups and downs in my life, I had a period of maybe two years in college where I actually genuinely felt GOOD about my life and where it was headed. Then my depression and anxiety got worse again. Spent a week in a behavioral hospital. Got on meds. They took the edge off but I never got back to that positive space. I wasn't miserable though, so they did their job.  Fast forward to last year, my dad killed himself in February. It came out of nowhere. Not gonna get deep into it, but we never had a great relationship until we reconnected around 2018. It pretty much wrecked me. I'm still not "over it." I can't even handle thinking about him.  Literally the only reason I haven't killed myself is because of my mom. She has no other family and it would destroy her if I died, especially in that way. I will not do that to her. But, as it stands right now, I'm going to kill myself when she's gone. I've never admitted that to anyone but I need to get it off my chest.  I keep hoping that something will happen to make me want to stick around. That I'll find passion for something, get a good job, maybe a partner. You know, the usual things. But it's hard to even muster up the energy to do simple things like get out of bed and shower. It's also just. . . hard to plan for the future when you've spent your whole life thinking, "I'm going to kill myself one day."  Honestly I'm kinda just posting this to get it off my chest. I don't really delve too deeply into how shitty I feel with my mom or my friends because I don't want to burden them. They've all got their own mental illnesses to deal with and I don't want to add my own baggage.

I talk about suicide quite a bit but let me flip the script for a second here. I'm super fucking thankful all humans end up in the same place; six feet under. Sharing the pile of dirt that is the Earth. From the presidents and aristocrats and the uber-wealthy. Thank the universe we all end similarly     Isn't it kinda a nice conclusion? One we all share. I like to call it the Great Neutralizer. The ultimate Stabilizer. Never forget it, were all intrinsically equal here on Earth. This is the proof. This is what I point to when I prove we are all equal. Never believe the idea you are less than any other. To prove it, you will die. They will die. Here is where you will both rest. Despite what any other human says. You will die, like them.          To me, I find this uplifting. As dark as it appears to be, I find it refreshing. Gives me good reason to not believe that yearly salary is what makes a man "valuable". Don't confuse societal standards for intrinsic worth. You're every bit as human as anyone else. Now go live before you all die.

(TW) Suicide is sometimes rational, and I'm trying to honestly figure out if that's where I'm at I'm 22, I've been homeless and fleeing domestic violence for most of my adult life with severe chronic PTSD, eating disorders that I'm statistically pretty likely to die from before 30 and depressive-psychotic episodes which often come at the worst times and put me in increased danger or can cause me to (accidentally) hurt anyone who cared enough to stick around. I wake up most days at 4 am re-experiencing rape, and my day usually gets worse from there on out. I've tried EVERY treatment I could access, from years of hospitalizations (10+, mostly voluntary and ALL of them made it much worse) and way more medication than any person should take, to off the books treatments and therapists, psycho-analysis, massage, acupuncture and Chinese herbs, other herbs, self-medicating with fun herbs, seeing dieticians and nutritionists and holistic life couches, DBT, CBT, ACT, EMDR, all kinds of groups and programs, live-in programs, eating disorder residentials, endless outpatient clinics, case management, peer support, even psychedelic therapy, getting an emotional support animal, skydiving, learning to play the harp, traveling the continent multiple times and trying to create my own hospital alternatives.  I've literally done everything I have the power to do to try and recover inside and outside of the system, and most of these things haven't made a considerable difference or have actually made it actively worse (meds lol). No matter the case, I don't have the resources to keep trying and I just don't have the energy anymore either.    My life ending early is likely to be unavoidable anyway, and continuing to live this miserably when I know it's likely for nothing (that I'll never get to recover, feel lasting happiness or maintain healthy relationships), feels cruel to me, especially when I can't stay alive without re-experiencing severe trauma near-daily and putting myself at real risk to repeat that trauma regularly. I've come to think of myself as someone who might be granted ethical assisted suicide if that existed in this country for mental health concerns, despite my age.      So, I'm here writing this mostly, simply, because I don't have any person in my life I can tell this to (except, actually, my mom, who agrees with me and supports my decision to end my life). But I want to know if other people agree this is reasonable or not. It wouldn't necessarily change my mind, but I am trying to do the most rational thing and at this moment my mind is still kind of open.  If you actually took the time to read all of this, bless your soul. If you're here to troll me, idk what else I was expecting i guess

I'd choose the blue pill In this case, I deem the blue pill as living the lie. To be more specific, the dilemma this is about is wether or not you would choose to live in a simulated reality or not, if you know for a fact your life would be better there.  I have modified it a bit, if you could press a buttom to relive only great the moments of your life maybe even make some edits to make those moments better and forget the bad ones, and then die, believing this to be real and being truly content, never realising that you're a) about to die b) that all of it was a lie. Why would you ever not press it? It truly seems like the perfect answer to all of life's suffering.  I've considered looking into self-delusion as a means of achieving something similar. I've often tried to convince myself when attempting to end my life that whatever bad happened wasn't real and "create my own reality" so to speak, so that I could die content. Never quite worked out, probably is practically impossible :/

Chronically ill. Suicidal. Sorry this is kind of long. I just have a lot to say and nobody in real life will listen.   I‚Äôm chronically ill with, what my doctors call, a severe case of Ehlers-Danlos syndrome. All of my joints dislocate on a daily basis, sitting too long will cause fabrics to rip into my skin, standing up makes me blackout instantly and I hit my head regularly because of this, I can no longer walk and use a wheelchair to get around, I have a problem with literally all of my organs from this, and I‚Äôm constantly in pain. There is no cure for this shitty disease I was born with. As of this year, I can‚Äôt drive anymore without vomiting or falling asleep.   Since it‚Äôs gotten worse this past year, I‚Äôve been struggling in school. Since I have accommodations through my university‚Äôs Accessibility Resources, I have excused medical absences and no late penalty for assignments. However, all of my professors tell me to drop out since I haven‚Äôt been able to attend the last two weeks. Even before I got worse recently, they always keep trying to ask ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs wrong with me‚Äù and I‚Äôm not comfortable sharing that with them and it‚Äôs incredibly awkward. Additionally, they‚Äôd always call me out in class and say shit like ‚ÄúI know this makes you uncomfortable, [name],‚Äù or ‚ÄúWould this work for you? I know you can‚Äôt walk.‚Äù I don‚Äôt know if they‚Äôre actually trying to be helpful but they make me feel singled out in front of 30+ people. One professor even keeps trying to meet me outside of class to talk about my ‚Äúmedical issues.‚Äù Accessibility Resources is in the midst of dealing with all of those problems, since I can‚Äôt deal with this anymore myself but it‚Äôs going nowhere.   I‚Äôve been diagnosed with Major Depressive disorder with psychotic features. Another doctor says I‚Äôm probably autistic on top of that but I can‚Äôt afford testing, since my insurance generally only covers 1% for procedures. They covered $17 of my brother‚Äôs $15k sleep study. I see psychiatrists, therapists, rheumatologist, occupational and physical therapists, cardiologists, gastroenterologist, a connective tissue clinic, and neurologists. I‚Äôve been seeing these people, from three different hospitals, for years now. I‚Äôm just not getting better.   I‚Äôm going to have to drop out of college since I can‚Äôt get to my classes or do any of the work. I have to quit my job because I can‚Äôt get to work. However, this job is waiting to fully hire me (with benefits and better health insurance) when I get my degree, since I‚Äôm two semesters away from graduating. But I‚Äôm throwing that all away since I literally can‚Äôt leave my bed.   I‚Äôve always been suicidal since I was ten and was constantly in and out of psych inpatient units. Since 2010, I‚Äôve tried to kill myself 20 times. The last time I was in an inpatient unit (last year), one of the male nurses pressed his erection into my back, and I can barely go into hospitals anymore because I‚Äôm just terrified of male doctors and nurses now.   I‚Äôm on ten different medications for a myriad of reasons and none work as intended.   I don‚Äôt have any friends, at work or from school, so I don‚Äôt have anyone to talk to or get help from. I lost all of my friends within the last year because they‚Äôre ‚Äútired of being friends with someone as disabled as [me].‚Äù   Last time I called 911 for assistance, they tried to put me in an inpatient unit, but chose not to after explaining what happened last time and that I‚Äôm actively seeing doctors on a weekly basis.   I‚Äôm at a loss and feel permanently stuck.   When I drop out, I‚Äôll lose all of my scholarships and grants and won‚Äôt be able to even do part time. So college is pretty much over for me, even though it was my favorite thing to do.   I don‚Äôt plan on living much longer. I‚Äôm done. I can‚Äôt live like this anymore. I‚Äôm so emotionally, physically, and academically exhausted. I‚Äôm truly not meant to live normally in this world and I‚Äôm tired of trying. I haven‚Äôt left my bed in days and don‚Äôt have energy to eat or drink.   Thanks for reading this, if you did. Nobody bothers listening to me in real life, so I guess it‚Äôs nice posting how I feel here.   TL;DR: Can‚Äôt do anything because of physical illnesses, probably going to kill myself soon.

She keeps taking my phone from me every night (I am typing this from my laptop). Usually, if I have problems like this, I go on there and talk to a friend that can help. But now I have to go on here just to live through possibly another terrible day. I don't know how much more I can take. I'm treated terribly and the moment I do or say anything about it, she gets mad at me. My siblings pretty much do whatever they want. My brother, growing up, was allowed to fight me, to threaten to harm me, and pretty much anything else. My sister is allowed to do the same stuff. Because "they're younger than you" or some shit. But the moment I tell her that I'm sick of this bullshit, I'm the next Ted Bundy. They literally hate me. All of them. I can't have a break for once. And her boyfriend is in on it, too. My mum asks me why I don't eat. Asks if I have an eating disorder (I've already told her no, but she still insists because I'm skinny). Her boyfriend comes to me in the middle of supper when I still haven't finished to ask me why I'm not eating. And I know it's the same bullshit reason she does it. He's so rude to me and every time I say something about it, my mum tells him that he isn't wrong and tells me that I'm being disrespectful. Even though I'm getting disrespected right in front of her. She knows that I want to die. She doesn't care. The last time I went to her for help, she yelled at me. And then told me that this was my fault because i haven't been praying enough. She knows I need help, but she refuses to help me. She's literally killing me. I don't know how long I can stay like this. I also have misophonia and they think it's funny to purposely trigger it. They'll even laugh. My mum made me cry a few days ago doing that. I've been living this way for years and it still hasn't gotten any better. It's only gotten worse. I don't want to be alive anymore. I can't handle it. All of this is too much and there's much more that I'd rather not say because of how long this is. I don't know how much longer I can go on like this. I don't think I can hang on for much longer.

If you're thinking of suicide... Seriously think about it. Don't do it because you're sad or depressed. Take your emotions and others opinions and thoughts out of the equation. Take a good, long look at your life. At life itself. Match up how you fit into all of it, and seriously do a lot of reflection and conclusive analysis on your life. Take a truthful look at your life and be brutally honest with yourself about whether or not it's something that is working for you. Is it worth it to continue living? Have you done everything you could to try and create the type of life you want? What is the likelihood of your life changing for the better? What is the likelihood of life, itself, changing for the better? Really sit and ponder things like that. I'm amazed at the clarity that comes from doing this. So, please think deeply about it. Because, the right choice for you will come from within. And listen to the choice made, because that will be the right choice.

I feel like part of the acceptance stage (final step in stage of grief) should be admittance to want of death IDK if this is the right sub. to post this but its one of the few that I think will actually accept a post like this and something I need to get off my chest.  &#x200B;  Anyway, I'm 23 years old and have Aspergers (high functioning Autism). When I went to college (started "real life") is really where my life started to fall apart. In general, from speaking to others this is a pretty common occurence for most people on the spectrum and other developmental disorders as such.   &#x200B;  In realizing how much it impacted me, I certainly went through the stages of grief. Now I feel I'm at the phase of acceptance in that I realize that there's no magic cure and its something I'll have to live with. That being said, I don't side with the general Aspie community it seems with the opinion that the development of pre-natal scanning for Autism for aborting is obscene and wrong. Not only that, but I strongly encourage it. I don't think it should be required to abort them but I do certainly think that REAL education of what its like raising a kid with Aspergers/Autism is like as well as the obstacles they face.   &#x200B;  At the end of the day, there are VERY few parents who I think can properly and effectively parent a child with it. I even tell my parents that I think you're good parents but not good parents for me (AKA somebody with Autism/Aspergers) but that I don't blame them for it because it shouldn't be expected of them. I don't think the parents should be stigmatized for it but at the same time its not fair to the kid.  &#x200B;  Not to mention the world in general is admittedly not structured for those on the spectrum. I guess you could argue that its possible for some to adapt but at the end of the day I don't really see the point of knowingly having a child who you know ahead of time is going to immensely struggle to blend in society (hence why I encourage abortion in most cases).   &#x200B;  A commonly asked question I see is why do we only ever see children with developmental conditions advertised/in media. At the end of the day, its because adulthood is almost always bleak. "Institutions" are still a VERY real thing. Lower functioning Autism, Down Syndrome, mentally retarded, etc. kids are still very much sent off when their parents no longer can/feel like taking care of them. I know the common belief in society is that the handling of mental illness until recently was very poor and everybody was just institutionalized, well, its the same thing now. The only difference is that they can live their childhood at home and with their peers before being sent off.   &#x200B;  Conditions like Aspergers aren't much less bleak. Most are able enough to not be sent to an institution but most companies outright refuse to hire those on the spectrum, the unemployment rate is ridiculously high, many jobs require skills Aspies don't naturally have. Most end up in poorly paid jobs reserved for those with "disabilities" or doing something else of little respect. I'm actually personally looking into doing sex work.  &#x200B;  I certainly don't see myself committing suicide at this point (although if assisted suicide becomes available I would take it). Although I think a real part of accepting my condition is realizing that I'm not all that special and can now more clearly see and accept the fact that Aspergers/Autism just doesn't work. I will say that one benefit (there aren't many) is I do think I'm a bit less judgemental after realizing how Aspergers/Autism impacts me. I can now more clearly see that jobs like sex work are no less respectable than any other company and have more respect for those workers and realizing that there's no shame in what they're doing.

[Academic] Research into Suicide within the LGBTQ+ Community Social Awareness Project Survey (all welcome) Hello all! Below is a link to a survey created for my class's Social Awareness Project. It's a short and sweet, 8-question survey based around suicide in the LGBTQ+ community that takes less than a minute to complete. I ask that anyone who is willing to, please take this survey. It is primarily geared towards those within the LGBTQ+ community, but anyone may take it. The results will go a long way in the data collection for the project and with spreading awareness of suicide within our community.  Due to the sensitive nature of the subject matter, please feel free to stop the survey at any time, or to just simply not do it as well.   All results are completely anonymous.  Please do not hesitate to reach out to me if you wish to discuss the subject at hand, any of the questions, or if you need any help with the survey.  Help is always available 24/7 to anyone in suicidal crisis or emotional distress at 1-800-273-8255.

A question... for those who experienced it themselves and/or those who heard people's experiences (My first post...) Hi, first of all I don't mean to hurt, offense, belittle anyone with this question. I'm just really wondering... and want to have a deeper understanding on this topic.  So, instead of all general data and content from the internet, I'm genuinely looking for experiences/stories of real people who are willing to (shortly) share personal experiences concerning 'h*nging'. Apparentely it's a quite 'popular' method according to general stories and movies...   I suppose people would choose this option because the supplies are rather easy to access and a 'clean' way for those who would find you?  Are these the main reasons or do you have other thoughts on it?   But nevertheless... and this is my main 'concern'. (Personally this method isn't appealing to me so don't worry, I just really want to obtain a deeper understanding). People often state this is an easy method, but honestly I can't believe it. It's true that one can buy these supplies quite easy and unnoticed (in comparison to firearms for example), but how about the execution of it... (I'm sorry :/) Mostly due to the fact that the thing they used to attach the rope broke or something similar to that...  Sorry if I trigger someone by this! I'm sorry for what you have been through, I can't even imagine your mental and physical pain. Sending love ~  Is someone willing to elaborate on this a bit/sharing thoughts on this in the comments? In short, I'm interested in the matter whether it's so easy as the majority of people claim it to be or not. (Because for now I simply can't imagine it would work that flawless)

I dont know where else to post this This might be extremely rambling but I‚Äôm pouring out my soul here. This isn‚Äôt a cry for help, if all you‚Äôre going to do is tell me not to, please save your breath for someone else.     Let me preface this by saying I have battled depression from a very young age, around 8 I suffered many losses of friends and family. I just turned 24 so its been 16 years and, I have fought and fought for a very long time. Even as a small child my parents told me that I would say things like ‚ÄúI want to go home to my real family.‚Äù and ‚ÄúThat I didn‚Äôt belong here‚Äù This would freak them and other out as a 4-5 year old would talk about being tired of life already and wanting to see his real family. I have lived my entire life homesick. Im tired. Not the kind of exhaustion I once felt where I just wanted to sleep, but one that I feel in my very being. Sleep was once a respite but now it‚Äôs just as bad if not worse than being awake. It use to come in waves but for the past few years it‚Äôs been ever constant, I don‚Äôt even have a moment to catch my breath. Just being wears me out anymore, I find no joy in anything, hell I barely feel anything anymore, almost everything that once brought me joy feels like a chore. Writing is one of my last few joys in this world so here I am writing. I have done many things to try to combat the depression and suicidal thoughts. Ive gone to therapy, tried different medications, psychadelics, meditation, dropping everything and moving away to start over, changing professions, going back to school, surrounding myself with happier people, etc, etc. Im currently on my last leg, I‚Äôm trying some more natural remedies, more natural suppliments, helping others again as that always seemed to at least ease my suffering even if only by a small amount. Ive tried to adhere to the buddhist teachings that if I ease the suffering of others I will ease my own.       The intent of this isn‚Äôt to be a suicide note, but if you find this and I have in-fact killed myself at this point, I hope this might provide some insight into why. Im writing this for myself not for anyone else, I‚Äôm hoping writing it out will let me work through some of my issues. I have never once in my life felt like I belong, when I‚Äôm surrounded by friends and loved ones I feel the most alone. I feel as though I‚Äôm little more than an imposter and that they either don‚Äôt like me and are faking it, or that they don‚Äôt even really know me and care about little more than a facade. Logically I know that there are people who at the very least SEEM to love me. Family and friends tell me they‚Äôd miss me, but in all honesty I am hitting the point where I no longer care. They tell me I‚Äôm being selfish, but aren‚Äôt they being selfish by trying to make me stay here and suffer. When I‚Äôve done psychadelics such as DMT I swear on everything that I‚Äôve seen my real family, and that I know they‚Äôre waiting for me. It‚Äôs not that they want me to kill myself, they want to see me live a good life, the want me to succeed and be happy. But I truly believe I have seen what Is waiting for us on the other side and it is so much more beautiful than anything you could imagine. The only time I‚Äôve ever felt true unconditional love was with them.     I feel like little more than a burden to those around me. I had to move back in with my parents recently thank to losing my job and covid. And I feel like I‚Äôm just a little bitch who can‚Äôt even stand on his own right now.       I have several mental illnesses; depression, anxiety, ADHD, OCD, and these all make doing things more and more difficult to do. I know there are people out there that cope with these and to those I‚Äôm SO proud of you. Ive tried a multitude of treatments, every single one has let me feel better for a couple of weeks and then my symptoms get worse. Im more apathetic and nihilistic than I‚Äôve ever been in my enter life. I used to exercise very day, and this helped, but after an accident in which I broke both my legs, I‚Äôve been unable to even get started back. I can‚Äôt even motivate myself to go out for a fucking walk. Honestly it feels like the only thing that has kept me from shooting myself Is the fact id have to go into another room unlock my safe and drive off to shoot myself so that my parents won‚Äôt find my corpse in their house. Im literally to unmotivated to even kill myself right now.  Even in rare moments of bliss I always think, man i should just end it on a high note.  I don‚Äôt want to sit here and play the victim, and I‚Äôm sorry if this comes off like I‚Äôm throwing myself a pity party. I just need to vent and get this out, some people in my life know bits and pieces, but I can‚Äôt imagine telling anyone I know all of it, I‚Äôm worried they would just have me committed and I REALLY don‚Äôt want that. A few people have said they‚Äôd be sad if I do kill myself but they‚Äôd understand as they‚Äôve watched me suffer for years. I honestly don‚Äôt even know why I‚Äôm posting this I don‚Äôt know what I hope to achieve from it. Maybe just a release of some of these emotions I‚Äôve been bottling up.  All in all ive seen enough death in my life to know just how inconsequential I am.  Ive seen how my family and most people react to death, They might be sad for a few months, maybe a year or two, but then life happens.  You slowly forget about them, new people enter your life, you become too busy to focus on what once was.  You might remember them on their Bday or around the time they died,  but all in all you move on after a couple of decades i doubt anyone would even really remember me.

Recently turned 19, mentally I'm at an all time low Now I'd like to preface this by saying I don't really think I'd go through with it, but the thoughts are there and they're getting worse. I haven't fucking talked to any of my friends for a solid 2 weeks now with the exception of a girl who's arguably my best friend at this point. She was feeling sad because secretly she hooked up with another guy in our friend group after they've been talking for a while and now he told he doesn't really feel well with going through with the relationship because he's not feeling mentally there as well. I comforted her and everything went fine and all, and it really sort of grounded me from all these depressive thoughts I'm having.   Anyway, I'm a 19 year old dude who know nothing about fucking anything. Lol never thought I'd be typing that. I'm barely 5'7 with a good face and build and all, but my hair has been falling since 17 and my mental has been spiraling down the fucking drain since I found out via two assholes I used to be friends with teasing me about it on a camping trip. Obviously it's gotten worse and Idk wtf to do. nice segway, because another major issue I'm fucking dealing with is not knowing what TO DO. AT ALL. I'm 19, everyone's going to University here, and even though I got offers, I'm not sure I want to go into debt here in Canada for something I'm not entirely sure about/interested in. Now that's normal but it's so fucking hopeless. Nobody can tell me what to do or what to feel and they're all tired of it because it's all I bring up whenever they ask me if I'm alright or how I'm doing. Always the same shit. I'm rotting away.   I've never experienced anything. I'm just 19 but I already feel old as if my time has already passed. To maintain morale in high school, I just gamed, really. Never dated, never had any girls interested and it's not getting any better now since I'm out of school and deciding if I wanna go to Uni next year or not. My only option is goddamn tinder, as if I'm gonna have any luck there, as a short guy that's also balding for no reason whatsoever. I've never even gotten laid one time while all of my friends have basically. I just don't think I'm cut out for this.   I want to live, I really do but I can't. I don't know how to proceed, all I know is that I wanna have some sort of artistic legacy and I wanna be good at something. I've picked up a guitar but idk how to learn it myself. Meanwhile my physical prime is already ending whereas everyone else's is just starting. I'm short, balding and even though I go to the gym, I'm still alone and feeling more secluded every day as I sit inside with nothing to do except play games and think. It's just so fucking hard dealing with all this shit at this age when everyone else is too busy worrying about girls and whether or not to get shitfaced while I'm worrying about the sad reality that all of this shit I want to experience isn't coming for me. It's not a regular part of MY life all because of shit I can't control. I just fucking can't take this anymore. Idk what I'm gonna do but it's beginning to look a lot like suicide is really an option.

This is a first draft of a writing prompt. Feedback would be great. Altogether, I hope it helps. Okay, I need you to do something for me today. You may not know who I am, but just know that this is something that may break you.  Take a second. Breathe.  I wrote this prompt not just for others who are struggling, but also for myself. I, too, participated. With each question, I want you to take your time. There is no pressure if there is not a lot written down. It is okay. Take as much time as needed. This is not a test.  For some of you, this may be sounding like a broken record. There are so many out there that are struggling with their mental health and feel that their own world is deteriorating and there is nothing they can do. For some, it feels like the end, so much to the point of ending their own life. Some may argue that they are doing their friends and family a favor by taking out a chunk of their supposed ‚Äúannoyance‚Äù or ‚Äúinconvenience.‚Äù I, too, have felt this pain. On multiple occasions, in fact.¬†  *I want you to take at least 5 of the most important people into your life. Could be a coworker, your best friend, your grandmother, etc.*¬†  *If you would like to add more people to that list, feel free; the more the merrier.*  *I want you to take those people that you have listed, and put little arrows/lines/etc next to each individual.*  *Now say that you have heard the news that, that name, that person you love and care for, has just taken their own life. Beside their name, I want you to take the time and write down what would be going through your mind. First instincts, who to call for help, reactions. If you need to doodle or draw instead, that is fine too. Take as much time as needed.*¬†  *I want you to flip this. You have poured out your heart, may have teared up at the mere thought. Now, I want you to think about the reactions of those people hearing the news that you had taken your life.*¬†  *Do you still believe that they would have an easier life without you? Love is an important gift that is precious and is so impactful. Take this to heart.*¬†

equal parts bitter rant/unsent letter. today is November 3rd. the day that for many reasons, i had planned on for my suicide.   this decision was made 3 months ago to the date. on September 3rd.  i was in an incredible amount of pain & needed a plan.   i decided that I‚Äôd find time to go to the beach. then return to my mother‚Äôs home where I‚Äôd do it.   there was pain. at that time.  over time the pain changed into vague apathy & a general dissociation from this existence.   early September was also the time i went into a deep isolation. stopped talking to everyone. in an attempt to protect myself.   i don‚Äôt really have anything to say. if i cared more, i would articulate all the ways i felt aggrieved. & maybe demand some kind of ramifications but. that doesn‚Äôt matter.  i‚Äôm not looking for sympathy. no one owes me anything.   i think that i want to communicate that there isn‚Äôt going to be a ‚Äúbetter‚Äù me. there‚Äôs some hopes that maybe if i go to therapy. something.   sometime in September i wrote, ‚Äòsomething inside me has died‚Äô & it isn‚Äôt coming back.   there‚Äôs nothing i am willing to work towards/to fix.   i am just patiently waiting for my next November 3rd.   i won‚Äôt set a date. so i feel flexible enough.  but i know it‚Äôs coming. i do not plan to live any longer than i already have - only to experience more pain.   i am wildly miserable now & i just cannot imagine things getting worse. & yet i know they will.   i am building up to the day that i will finally have the courage that sneakily eluded me today.

Everything will get worse over time for me, So what's the point anymore. Hi Everyone.  Before I Begin this long story, Here's a bit of information to help you.  [[Age ~ Highschool Level.]]  [[Diagnosis ~ ADD ~ When Angered, I Can't think of my actions.]]  [[Feelings ~ Loneliness, Depression, Lack of confidence and a crisis of faith.]]  Anyways, Now to talk.  I'm Just here to say that I Can't deal with the amount of internet/Real life embarrassment and neglect anymore, in this post, I'll discuss my problems, Situations and thoughts about them.  I started using the internet in 2016, Beginning with "Instagram", Because everyone else was using it, I'd figure it would be a good way to make some friends and socialize with people at my school, So I Decided to put up my art project as my first post there, Around October 10-21st of that year.  During this period, I had extreme amounts of people teasing me because of my art, My Personal struggles and humiliate me based on what I Like and don't like, This was not 2-4 People, This was around 90 Different people all at once harassing me one by one, It put me in tears and I Had to abandon the account for 5 Years and counting.  The School board did not do anything about this, The Parents did nothing about this, Literally nobody cared, In fact, This has ruined my school life further because right after I Quit The App, I've been put into 1v1 Teaching classes, And never spoke to another classmate, or student, or anyone else, From Gr5 until Gr8, Around 2019.  Grade 8 and 9 were ok, But People were constantly talking behind my back, And I Had an assistant teacher watch me like a hawk during those periods, Because of That, I'd be called "Teachers pet" for the rest of middle school, Further   High school is a lot worse, Because you got students with pocket knifes and the teaching is more corrupted, All my courses were just an infliction of pain every time I Attend them, I'll label them.  [ Design ] - All you do is rub sandpaper on wood, Since I'm sensitive to sharp things and frequently rub my eyes, It's painful to get it through and deal with a passing mark while not having scars and cuts.  [ Gym ] - Sports is fun, But not the way this class is, The Crowd there harasses me, Steals my lunch, Interrupts tests, And never let's me on a team during sports, The Teacher refuses to give me a good mark despite me passing all the paperwork, And now that I Have failed, I Would have to attend my summer in school during a pandemic doing the thing I'm not built for.  [ Math ] - Constant pressure from this course makes my life at home never relaxing, Everyday, I have a boatload of work to do in school and home, And since I Have back pains when I'm home, This makes this class a lot more harder than it needs to be, Classmates aren't any better.  [ English ] - Always disrupted during work, Inuit language is nearly impossible to identify quickly without a lot of work, Painful seat, And a rat hole near my desk, Combined with Math, Is literal hell.  All of this is made worse with one flaw, Nobody knows that I Even exist, Whenever I Ask a question, Try to talk, Or even do something good, They all ignore me.  The thing that nails my depression to the very core, is my reddit reputation, It's a long story, But I'll explain it.   I have began looking for a social media app to replace Instagram so that I could post my work and show people that I am talented and that I have some good qualities, So I Wouldn't be deemed as a "No-Life" to my classmates, I Wanted to be popular on that app and show my classmates that I can be as good as them.  Then, as you know it, I discovered reddit, Started an account, And started some posts about the xbox 360, Which was short lived, As I Went on to the Fortnite Sub to keep up with the times, And that's where things started to go wrong.  There was one post about a "CheerLeader" concept, I Personally found it disgusting, and way too sexualized for the game, I Posted a comment on it, saying that, and then, Controversy arose.  There was a subreddit that criticizes the "Stupidity" of fortnite users on reddit, And they put my comment on there, I seen people call me even more names and insulted my previous posts (Drawings.), At that point, I Had enough of how I'm treated, And Have step foot on that post, and Have put down my opinion on them, And criticized the idea of a subreddit bashing opinions.  And then, Well, I have been hated, Very, Very, Hated, On the site, People started Dm'ing me daily insulting me, and the previous posts I Had were now being attacked for how I view things, Once I Started insulting the people Dm'ing me insults back, The controversy grew even more, And Now, I'm deemed racist, Just for not agreeing with them. ( Nobody won't agree to "Go Kill yourself" nicely. )  I'd tried to ignore the criticism, But it still would constantly appear, Blocking, Being Polite and Improving my posts still didn't help my situation.  I Then Created a subreddit for my art projects so that I Can Control my criticism, and to let things die down, But unfortunately, They grew even more, Supposedly, A User wanted to be a friend and felt bad about my situation, But it later turned to be a diversion when I Let him help me with my subreddit and gave him mod privileges.  During that period, I Have gotten P-banned, Because of "Spam", But the thing is, I Didn't intend my projects to be Spam, I tried appealing, But it then got covered by the controversy that happened above, Therefore, My first account was gone, Since I couldn't be mod on my subreddit, This led to my "Friend" Inviting the people that harassed me, Onto the sub and made it about the "Stupid shit" I have done, I had no control over it.  At this point, I have changed my goal from "Proving myself" to "Getting rid of negative information"  I have started a new account, And Tried to keep clear of those people, I'd figure it would help my situation, But unfortunately, It didn't, While I Used the second account, A subreddit "Shrine" then put me in their topics, And have made posts claiming that "2020 would not be the bad guy anymore" and how one post depicts my art character being shot, Which further deepens How badly I Want this situation to stop.  The second account got banned, For "evasion", Even though I Haven't broke any violations in the previous account, My goal is still undetermined, So I Made a third account.  I Temporarily diverted my attention to other subreddits so that the conflict would die down, as it wouldn't have happened, I turned my attention to the old subreddit I Have created, And have convinced a user to create a new one, Things here then took a turn-around, We abandoned the old subreddit, And went on the new one, The New one STARTED Out good.  When it began, We all just chatted, Apologized to each-other, and even made a few projects there as it was it's intended purpose, Until, It happened again.  You see, During that period, I Tried to make a Web-Show to show the world my "Acting career", It was just about reviewing games, While people have made fun of my appearance on it there, I'd ignored it, and then went on to pursue new things, Like Connecting to my classmates and trying to start chatting with girls, As it's high-school, I Don't want my future son to think I Was a Nerd during that age, I'm very strict about this thing.  I have also been introduced to Discord at the time, I Joined the server of our subreddit to get started, and at this point, The true opinions of me came from them.  In short terms, Almost everyone on that server didn't like me at all, They couldn't stand me, Even when I Tried to be polite, They still wouldn't concede, There was one user that didn't participate in harassing me, But I'll get on that topic later.  You see, When they get my insult of them, The first instinct of what came to their minds is by screenshotting it, Every time I Say it's justified, They bring up the screenshot and putting it out like They are the victim, However, They are sometimes right of what I do comment, But it doesn't deserve an entire subreddit built for that purpose.  Soon as you know it, Those screenshots are on the subreddit, Giving me, Once again, A Bad name.  At that point, I Was Completely Losing my shit, Until this one user ( Not revealing official, Call it "BH" ), Dm'ed and tried to discuss about what I Have been dealing with, And here's the part where I Have messed up.  Since I Wasn't socializing or talking to students for 3 Years, It gave me a disadvantage, I couldn't get a proper idea for "Falling for a girl." And here's when my speech becomes bad.  Because of how I depict my view of that topic, It caused me to simp at a Fictional character instead of someone in the real world, As I Didn't have any knowledge or confidence, or looks, that I Would have one, Because of this, It began a path as where I Would rather live in a fantasy then actual real life.  I had feelings for BH, As I Felt Like Someone Finally Cared for me And I Wanted to tell her, But I Couldn't, As the server would hate me, So I Dm'ed her, Admitting to her that fact, At first, She found it cute, And has thought that I Was kidding.  Then after a day or two, She asks me if I Was Roleplaying, And When I Said no, She started to have a grudge against me, and all those months later, I Try my best to show I Care for her, From poems, to projects, She wouldn't care a single bit.  One day, She told me that she was "Bisexual" or "Trans", Which Has Shocked me, but sadly, she took my shock the wrong way and has depicted it as "Transphobia", Which unfortunately, Brings down my reputation a whole lot.  This was my breaking point, At 7 Months of tolerating this, I have lost my mind and didn't care about my actions, So I Did the Unthinkable things that I Had no thought before they were done.  From Minor Sexual Harassment, To Racist Comments, To even depicting them in my posts in negative ways. (Ex. Putting them in my games without consent.), It was clear that at this point I Was on the verge of a breakdown.  This curbs down a whole lot more when I discovered google images surrounding these screenshots from the subreddit, And one of them shows my face attached next to it, Uncensored.  Ever since that happened, I Feared about Jail and death row, Because I Thought I Unintentionally caused a minor offensive, Even though, I don't want all of this to happen.  I had fears of my life being ruined because of that, I Had nightmares every night of death row and Jail-Bars, Even one about Unemployment and dying alone, It was enough to make me panic.  I even tried faking my own death so that it would go away, But even that didn't work.  So where does that bring me now? Well, At this point, Still, The exact same treatment, And multiple people from their tell me that I'm irredeemable, I Wouldn't put my blame all 100% on them, As I Admit, I Done a few of those things and feel bad about them and try to reconcile, But the fact of them not accepting any of my apologies along with the fact that my identity on the internet is now known as "A Racist/Sexual Predator" is absolutely horrifying.  Look, I'm not a bad guy, I Swear, I am nothing like I Am on the server, IRL, I'm quiet, Kind, And A bit lazy, But when my unintentional bad side comes and overshadows my actual personality, You know that's not good news.  As of right now, I'm literally begging on my hands and knees for them to remove the content and help me, But I Have no hope, no internet friends, and no future.  Bad Internet Reputations also lead to damages to my Employment for a Job, my online relationships in 20 Years, and my chance to make friends with new people.  With the thought of the internet damaging my future, The pain of my experience in school life wearing me down, and the thought of nobody knowing that I Even exist is where I Just don't feel the will to live anymore, And therefore, I cannot take this pain anymore.
