IDK what to do at this point or where to start Any advice is welcome I really need it now more than ever.    Long Story  So I'm writing this as a last-ditch effort, for a version of myself that wants a better life than I currently have. I‚Äôll try to be as brief as I can, I grew up in a single-parent household with an overly protective religious parent. I am the oldest of three siblings on my mothers' side, I have too many siblings to count on my religious dads‚Äô side.  I grew up taking care of my siblings BECAUSE WE ALL HAVE DIFFERENT FATHERS AND OUR FATHERS ARE EITHER DEAD OR TRASH, OR BOTH, and again single black mother with no college education and an indifferent extended family. My immediate family and I were in and out of homelessness throughout my middle & high school years due to both my younger brothers and my mother's frequent sick spells.  At some point during all this, I decided that I was going to commit suicide because I couldn‚Äôt imagine a life beyond being there to helping her and my siblings and I felt pretty empty inside.  Growing up in high school I became aware that I was gay or at least BI and was living in the household that I was living in, this is also around the time I learned that my estranged father died. I became detached and isolated myself in high school and away from my family at home. After a time I became involved with my local community center and did a lot of volunteering to keep busy.  Through volunteering, I was shown that there could be a future beyond my current circumstances. I became the face of multiple programs for teens at the community center.  I graduated high school and managed to get into the college I wanted to attend in a different city. A few program directors as well as the founder of my community center gave me both supplies and some resources to make my first year at university easier.  I was able to meet up with a Community Center alum who was attending the same university I was going to and they were going to show me the ropes. I somehow involved my mother in the process and she suggested that I go to a different campus than the one I had set up so that another member of my estranged family could check in on me.  From that point forward it was a slow march downhill, I realized that I was surrounded by people who knew what they wanted and I had no clue. I was still pretending to be straight and pretending to have my shit together and didn't. In truth, I felt empty, alone, and guilty that I had left my family. I was also reminded that I was poor and university life cost money that I didn't have. I got a credit card and went into debt buying college books. I had an emotional and mental break, I failed out of university. I had a falling out with the nearby family member when I failed out of school because I was without an immediate way home and wanted to try and work and get back into school.  From that point onward I was back to feeling suicidal, I tried to regain lost ground but I was ashamed that I had failed, and let my mentors down. I eventual was able to return home and back to more isolation. My depression grew to the point that some days I was bedridden. That was in 2011 and here I am in 2020 feeling just as lost and isolated, things that I once enjoyed I don't now. I came out to my mom, she initially didn't take it well and to this day doesn't take it well. I feel like I have been lying to myself and others for so long that I no longer know what I want from life or why it's worth living. I feel empty, I want to feel like living again. I don‚Äôt know what to do with my life, I don't know what to do with my career, I‚Äôm in debt to the state and several universities due to me failing classes, I can't afford out of pocket tuition, and have been bouncing from job to job listlessly trying to get into a better financial position while dealing with some of the legit worst people on Earth. I‚Äôm the most overweight I‚Äôve ever been. I‚Äôm just at a loss and I need to figure out where I go from here. I'm tired of feeling this way.  TL;DR  I‚Äôm suicidal, I don't know what to do with my life or career, I‚Äôve been depressed for so long that I‚Äôve lost interest in most things that used to bring me joy. I'm in debt to several educational institutions and am currently unable to continue a formal education because I can't afford it. I am currently very overweight and have always had body dysmorphia issues. I'm currently out of a job Idk what I‚Äôm going to do or if it‚Äôs even worth it to try. This is a final cry for help, idk what I‚Äôm expecting from here but at the very least this will have been a brief account of my life.

I envy you To everyone talking about killing themselves because of relationship problems or social anxiety just know that there‚Äôs at least one person who would trade you for your life in an instant. You really have no idea how bad life can actually be.  When I was 18 I watched my grandfather die of cancer. This was my first experience with death and by far the easiest problem I‚Äôve faced since. He was a foundational block in my family that eventually got too old and died peacefully with the rest of us there to comfort him.  Next was my little cousin. I say cousin but he was more like my brother. I talked to him every single day and every single night. He was my best friend. Words cannot describe how much I loved that kid and wish to this day I could trade places with him. He died of a heart attack 3 hours after I got off the phone with him. That kind of pain is beyond what I can type in a post. This happened in 2018 and to this day I wake up absolutely reeling in pain. I‚Äôve screamed until I can‚Äôt, cried endlessly until my eyes felt like they were gonna bleed, and repeated this cycle indefinitely.  After him my uncle was murdered for $1,200 by people I had known for a while. I went to school with their younger brother. My uncle and I ran a little slot machine room and these guys came by pretty often. They were poor like everyone else in my town so we gave them drinks and snacks while they dropped a couple dollars in the machines here and there. After I left for school they stabbed him 39 times. 15 of which was in the face. This was 3 days before his son who I have helped raise since I was littles birthday. I had to look this kid in the eyes and tell him everything was going to be ok when I knew it wasn‚Äôt. This was the second hardest thing I‚Äôve ever lived through.  After all the death my mom thought it would be a good time to split after numerous accusations of infidelity on both sides so she took off. Dad being the fucking prick he is got mad and burned my family home down.  Now I get to tell you all about what my A1 parents were doing while my entire life was crumbling before 20 year old eyes. I begged and pleaded them to let me come home from college. All I wanted to do was be around my family and friends. To give myself a chance to at least try to heal from the horrible fucking trauma that was continuously happening in my life. They weren‚Äôt having it. They ridiculed and threatened to cut me off of everything if I dared leave. I was fucking dying inside and they they forced me to fucking watch from the sidelines. But it‚Äôd be too easy to just isolate me from everything happening. No instead they had to make sure to weaponize me every single chance they had to attack one another. Every time they pissed each other off during this horrible fucking multi-year long divorce they made sure to call me screaming. I heard every. Single. Detail. I read my dad‚Äôs suicide notes. I watched the fucking videos where he ‚Äúfinally was gonna do it this time‚Äù fucking prick I wish he did. My mom was just as crazy. Every single day it was something else with her. Bashing her car into my dads truck. Sneaking into his new apartment slashing his beds and bleaching his clothes. I come from a small town so everyone I knew was watching this happen with me. I‚Äôd almost be embarrassed if I wasn‚Äôt so busy literally trembling to the point where I couldn‚Äôt be in public. At this point I hadn‚Äôt left my room in years. Honestly that‚Äôs not even the full story but I don‚Äôt have any energy left to type the rest out.   TLDR: My life is quite literally a worse case scenario. I still think about suicide every now and then but DON‚ÄôT FUCKING KILL YOURSELF OVER BULLSHIT RELATIONSHIP PROBLEMS OR GENERAL ANXIETY. You are redeemable.

I want to overdose on my 21st birthday. I'm literally so upset right now. I'm honestly not looking forward to my 21st birthday because after that, everyone expects you to be a REAL adult and any social pressures I'm already struggling with are only going to get worse. I don't want to dress up in a fancy dress that day because all of them make me look fat. I can't drink because I'm on meds, plus I don't like alcohol, and either of these things are going to make me a social outcast for now on, making it harder to make friends, let alone find someone to date. Why? Because guys my age don't like women who are prudes/don't party and alcohol is a HUGE part of the college experience.   I've hated college so far, and I literally have classes tomorrow. The only thing that's keeping me going at this point is the idea that I only have to make it until my 21st birthday until I can legally overdose and drink a pint of vodka if I really want to. Aka, at-will suicide. Which is incredibly tempting, when I honestly can't and really don't see a way out.  I don't care if I'm "smart", I don't care if I'm "talented", I don't care if I've made the dean's list in college. All I want to be right now is dead. Fucking dead. Because then all my pain would go away. I'd rather tough out drinking charcoal in a hospital than think about living the next 50-60 years of my life in complete misery.  My start of my year has been absolutely miserable, with the guy I'm really interested in telling me he likes me but doesn't want to date right now, being diagnosed with major depression and generalized anxiety (aka finding out that you're mentally ill after having to veto a third diagnosis from a ***double*** board-certified psychiatrist), my best friend showing a nasty side to her and full-on betraying me, and borderline losing my job because of legitimately forgetting about showing up to my work shift *because* of depression/emotional issues.  Every friendship and potential romantic relationship has turned to shit for me. Nothing in that area in my life has worked out for me so far.  I know to everyone else, I'm "young", but I feel like my life is already going downhill and it's only going to get worse and worse from here.  I honestly want to be run over by a car. I can't drive safe anymore. I hate myself, hate my life, and would hate to hurt my parents if I was dead, but I can't do this anymore.   I feel like what I look forward to these days is going to sleep earlier than usual, because that's the closest and safest thing to actually being dead.

Yesterday, I wanted to die. Today, I'm not sure, but still leaning toward it. Be ready for a ramble. I'm American and politically involved, and yes, I know just saying that is inviting trolls to attack me. Mainly, recent news has brought me to this point. Yesterday, I made it through work by the skin of my teeth without having an anxiety attack, but had one at home severe enough to have me think that it would never end. Cognitively, I knew not to kill myself, which should probably preclude me from posting here in the first place. However, my first bodily instinct was to do something against myself. I had been experiencing fleeting suicidal ideations for a long time, but only tried to act on them once some years ago.   Family tell me I'm irrational when I get like that. To them I say, "gee, you think?" But that's not the point. The point is when I get that way, it hurts. A lot. And it feels like there is no way out. And I will always be under an anxiety attack. And even if I'm not, it will happen again. And again. And again. And again x1000. And that's no way to live.  I called the hotline instead, and they tell me to distract myself. I go to therapy and he tells me to express anger differently. I go to my mother and she is devastated that she doesn't know how to help. I may be alive, but I still feel like useless a sack of crap. I'm still aimless on this front, but I know one thing: I still have an ounce of self preservation. I'm not dead, but God does it feel like I should be, but not by me.   I don't know if I'm still not making sense. I'm probably not. Because when I'm calm and collected, it makes no sense. But when I'm anxiously perseverating, it seems like the most logical solution.

Why I Believe my Life is Simply Not Worth Living (1st post, please read) I'm a 16 year old girl & I've recently realized that life isn't as good as I was once thought it was. For my entire childhood I've felt chronic melancholy or this horrible feeling that something was horribly wrong, even though there wasn't. As far as I know, I had a very healthy and loving upbringing, but for some reason I've always felt like I was put here on this planet to be hated, it's almost like a fact to me. Even when I was 4 years old I strongly believed this, & I still do, & I have no idea why. I have had chronic depression since 7th grade, very bad social anxiety, germaphobic OCD, lots of anxiety about tons of different things, horrible attention span/focusing issues, & now I have POCD, which has made me the saddest out of all of these. I hate school SO much. Even writing one sentence for an English project saps all my energy. I have about 5 hours of homework every day but I usually only do a bit or sometimes none. What's bothering me now is that I have thought horrible things in the past, like when I was 8th grade I said I wanted to "shoot up" my school because I thought everyone hated me, even though they probably didn't at all. And I think I really did. I hate myself for saying this. It's weird to think that I said that because I'm such a different person now. But sometimes I get scared that maybe if I was pushed enough I would think that again. I don't feel like I would, but then again how do I know? I've never even killed a fly, I feel too bad. I'm just so confused & I'm not scared of death because my life has been more painful and terrifying than death will ever be. I feel like I've always been a horrible disgusting person & death is the perfect thing for me to pursue.
Suicide is the answer to being surrounded by people who hate you They hate me regardless of my actions, they just hate me because I'm who I am. Suicide is the only solution to this.
